# ContractAppURI class

Have an official Application URI for this contract.

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
const appURI = await contract.appuri.get();
appURI = "ipfs://some_ipfs_hash";

await contract.appuri.set(appURI);
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                       | Modifiers | Description                                                        |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [(constructor)(contractWrapper, metadata)](./sdk.contractappuri._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ContractAppURI</code> class |

| Property                                           | Modifiers | Type                                                                   | Description |
| -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| [featureName](./sdk.contractappuri.featurename.md) |           | "AppURI"                                                               |             |
| [metadata](./sdk.contractappuri.metadata.md)       |           | [ContractMetadata](./sdk.contractmetadata.md)&lt;BaseContract, any&gt; |             |

## Methods

| Method                                     | Modifiers | Description |
| ------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| [get()](./sdk.contractappuri.get.md)       |           | Get App URI |
| [set(appURI)](./sdk.contractappuri.set.md) |           | Set App URI |

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractAppURI<TContract extends BaseContract> implements DetectableFeature
```

**Implements:** DetectableFeature

## Remarks

Configure an official Application URI for this contract.
